page.shortlink: api desktop api a5 database compact function
page.description: The A5_DATABASECOMPACT() function compacts a database and rebuilds indexes. This is the same as the File > Database Compact command. .
page.syntax: V a5_DatabaseCompact([L silent [,C title [,C message [,C completed_title [,C completed_message ]]]]])

argument.name: silent
argument.description: Default = .T. Determines whether the Title and Message are displayed during the compact, .T. = No messages, .F. = Alpha Anywhere displays the Title and Message during the compact operation.

argument.name: title
argument.description: Default = "Notice". The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: message
argument.description: Default = "Please wait". Alpha Anywhere is compacting the Database." The message that is displayed during the compact.

argument.name: completed_title
argument.description: Default = "Notice". The title of the dialog box after the compact.

argument.name: completed_message
argument.description: Default = "Database Compact completed." The message that is displayed after the compact.
